author: Averi Harper
title: Sanders says people shouldn't 'have to worry' about health care amid coronavirus
description: Sen. Bernie Sanders joined ABC's "The View," further highlighting his Medicare for All plan, saying people "shouldn't have to worry" about health care.
content:
Vermont Sen. Bernie Sanders joined the hosts of ABC's "The View" remotely on Wednesday, as the novel coronavirus and related "stay at home" orders cripple much of the nation, saying amid the crisis, people "should not have to worry about" their health care.
… [+4739 chars]
